inclusion.criterion: periampullary carcinoma and carcinoma of the head of pancreas
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: unresectable tumour assessed by imaging techniques
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of cholecystectomy and Billroth II gastrectomy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas, but also has a diverticular abscess which may be an exclusion criterion.
